definitions.definition: ( intransitive , originally US ) Chiefly followed by out : originally ( mining ) , of a vein of ore : to be depleted of ore; now ( generally ) , to diminish to nothing ; to dwindle , to trail off .

main_definition: ( intransitive , originally US ) Chiefly followed by out : originally ( mining ) , of a vein of ore : to be depleted of ore; now ( generally ) , to diminish to nothing ; to dwindle , to trail off .

definitions.definition: Synonym of blue peter ; to call for trump by throwing away a high card while holding a lower one.

main_definition: ( card games , intransitive ) Synonym of blue peter ; to call for trump by throwing away a high card while holding a lower one. [from 19th century]
